heading: HR01969
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE HOUSE COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION ON THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE'S "OPLAN TAMBAY" FOLLOWING THE VERBAL ORDER OF PRESIDENT RODRIGO DUTERTE WHICH RESULTED TO THE ILLEGAL ARREST OF ABOUT 7,291 ALLEGED VAGRANTS, "TAMBAYS" OR IDLE INDIVIDUALS
